author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

As a step towards removing `SwitchProducer` from the framework, this PR removes all uses of `SwitchProducerCUDA` from packages outside HeterogeneousCore. The next step will be to remove `SwitchProducerCUDA` from `HeterogeneousCore`. 

In some parts this PR overlaps with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46076, in other parts it is complementary. In https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46076#issuecomment-3084359028 we agreed to proceed by removing the use of `SwitchProducerCUDA` first.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1513

#### PR validation:

None
title: Remove the use of `SwitchProducerCUDA` outside HeterogeneousCore
